subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are accepting your refinance debt request
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this tender will expire NOW):
$351,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this quick form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://zodqunoot.com/
